description: A bill that would ban vegetarian items from being called sausages or burgers is set to be voted on.
title: EU asks: Is a vegetarian sausage really a sausage?
title_page: EU asks: Is a vegetarian sausage really a sausage? - BBC News
maintext: On the other side, Swedish MEP Jytte Guteland told the BBC that relabelling such products would only confuse consumers. "Of course the big battle this week is about putting the right incentives for farmers to ensure we have as little pollution as possible. That being said, we need to eat less meat."
